item.title: Release-Notes: February 2024 Agent Release Notes
item.description:
Package Version Release
0.2.20240220-1987 a-0.1.0

This is the initial release of the agent-based Trustgrid node software.

Production Features include:

  • Support for Ubuntu 22.04
  • Basic agent VPN functionality
  • Layer-4(L4) Proxy support with services and connectors

Beta Support:

  • Running the agent in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 and in containers like Docker/k8s
